modShortDescription: This mod adds a "EmotePhone" that holds 40 emotes in 20 slots.
modDescription:
This mod adds a “EmotePhone” that holds 40 emotes in 20 slots. Select the slot in the radial menu that appears when holding “Reload”. The 2 selected emotes appear on the phone screen, “LMB/Primary button” launches the left one, “RMB/Secondary button” launches the right one. Enjoy.

**[Download](https://github.com/Snufki-n/Snufkin_Modlets_A19/raw/master/Snufkin_Emotes.rar)**

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/20983-snufkins-emotes/).

**Credits:** [Snufkin](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/snufkin/)
